user.title: School Schedule Setup
user.description: Configure when the display switches from showing today's items to tomorrow's items.

data_description.switchover_time: After this time, the card will show tomorrow's required items instead of today's. Default is 12:00 (noon).

add_child.name: Add Child
add_child.description: Add a new child to the school schedule.

remove_child.name: Remove Child
remove_child.description: Remove a child from the school schedule.

add_item.name: Add Item
add_item.description: Add an item to a child's available items list.

child_name.name: Child Name
child_name.description: The child to add the item to.

item_id.name: Item ID
item_id.description: A unique identifier for this item (e.g., 'formal_uniform').

item_name.name: Item Name
item_name.description: Display name for the item (e.g., 'Formal Uniform').

remove_item.name: Remove Item
remove_item.description: Remove an item from a child.

child_name.name: Child Name
child_name.description: The child to remove the item from.

update_item.name: Update Item
update_item.description: Update an item's name or image.

child_name.name: Child Name
child_name.description: The child who owns the item.

set_weekly_schedule.name: Set Weekly Schedule
set_weekly_schedule.description: Set which items are needed for a specific day of the week.

child_name.name: Child Name
child_name.description: The child to set the schedule for.

day.name: Day of Week
day.description: The day to configure (monday, tuesday, etc.).

item_ids.name: Item IDs
item_ids.description: List of item IDs needed on this day.

add_exception.name: Add Exception
add_exception.description: Add a schedule exception for a specific date (overrides weekly schedule).

child_name.name: Child Name
child_name.description: The child to add the exception for.

item_ids.name: Item IDs
item_ids.description: List of item IDs for this date (use empty list for no items needed).

remove_exception.name: Remove Exception
remove_exception.description: Remove a schedule exception, reverting to the weekly schedule.

child_name.name: Child Name
child_name.description: The child to remove the exception from.

set_switchover_time.name: Set Switchover Time
set_switchover_time.description: Set when the display switches from today to tomorrow.
